<details>
<summary>Additional Comments (1)</summary>

**`src/agents/tools/slack-actions.ts`**
[P0] `listPins` passes `readOpts` only when `writeOpts` is set

In the `listPins` branch you gate passing `readOpts` on `writeOpts` (`const pins = writeOpts ? await listSlackPins(channelId, readOpts) : ...`). This will drop the user-token/accountId overrides for read operations whenever write is disabled (e.g. user token is read-only or no bot token), causing `listPins` to run with default credentials unexpectedly.

This should likely be `readOpts ? await listSlackPins(channelId, readOpts) : await listSlackPins(channelId)`.
